Description: Custom bistable solenoid 6-7mm dia, 1mm stroke, flat plunger face, 5VDC 0.5A
Notes: Custom OEM $1.70 @ 1K+ (12-week lead, MOQ 1000). NO COTS bistable solenoids <7mm dia available. Bistable (latching) for zero hold power. Flat face for cam/lever contact. Lever mechanism reduces 6mm→2.5mm pitch.

Description: Rotary cam disc (injection molded, steel mold)
Notes: Production cost @ 10K+ volume, cam profile for ±45° rotation
Production cost @ 10K+ volume, or COTS brass alternative
Also available in SOIC/QFN for SMT

Description: 8-channel Darlington array (H-bridge config for bidirectional drive)
Notes: Bistable solenoids need bidirectional drive (SET/RESET pulses). 192 solenoids × 2 directions = 384 channels. 384 ÷ 8 = 48 chips needed for full H-bridge control.
Pilot only, ~200×100×25mm, switch to injection mold for production

Bulk cap for driver IC power rail filtering (EMI suppression, inductive kickback energy absorption). Place one per ULN2803A IC (24 total for ARCH_SOL_ECO, 3 ICs; varies by architecture). NFR-EMI-001 compliance.
Ceramic bypass for driver IC (EMI suppression, high-frequency decoupling). Place one per ULN2803A IC (24 total for ARCH_PIEZO_ECO/DLX, 3 for ARCH_SOL_ECO). NFR-EMI-001 compliance.
USB bus-powered, lower voltage than 100V piezo (easier isolation, less EMI)
